thread.title: Roadside bomb kills Egyptian police officer in Sinai
thread.title_full: Roadside bomb kills Egyptian police officer in Sinai | News24

author: news24.com
title: Roadside bomb kills Egyptian police officer in Sinai
text:
Cairo - Security and medical officials say a roadside bomb has killed a police officer and wounded three conscripts in Egypt's northern Sinai city of el-Arish.
The officials say Friday's blast targeted an armoured car carrying the four as they travelled to a security checkpoint.
No group immediately claimed responsibility for the attack.
An Islamic State affiliate based in northern Sinai and other militant groups have carried out dozens of attacks, mainly targeting security forces, since the military overthrow of Islamist president Mohammed Morsi in 2013.
